requirements.summary: Replace all public, user-facing app name strings from ocarina-branded wording to "3Docarinas" (exact capitalization), including document title, navbar fallback, and loading screen.
acceptanceCriteria: The HTML document title in frontend/index.html is "3Docarinas" (no remaining "Ocarina Learning & Community Platform").
The navbar/site name fallback text rendered by frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx shows "3Docarinas" when no branding.siteName is set (no remaining "Ocarina Learning").
The loading screen text in frontend/src/components/LoadingScreen.tsx reads "Loading 3Docarinas..." (no remaining "Loading Ocarina Hub...").
No other visible UI strings on the public-facing pages refer to the old app name (manual spot-check: header, footer, loading screen, and homepage hero area).

file_operations.description: Update the HTML <title> from the old ocarina-branded name to exactly "3Docarinas" per acceptance criteria.
Change the site name fallback text (used when branding.siteName is unset) from "Ocarina Learning" to exactly "3Docarinas" so header/footer render the new name by default.
Update the loading message string from "Loading Ocarina Hub..." to exactly "Loading 3Docarinas...".
